name: Snake Bite
description: A snakebite is an alcoholic drink from the UK, a refreshing addition on the average Stout.

ingredients.ingredient: Your choice of Stout or Lager

directions: Pour the Hard Cider into a tall pint glass,
Slowly Add the Stout or lager of choice,
if done correctly, their should be seperation between stout and cider.
Finally add Currant Syrup and serve without a garnish. Enjoy.
